channel.title: Visualization on Dario Arcos-Díaz, PhD
channel.description: Recent content in Visualization on Dario Arcos-Díaz, PhD

item.title: Exploratory analysis of Medicare drug cost data 2011-2015
item.description: Health care systems world-wide are under pressure due to the high costs associated with disease. In this post, I performed an analysis of Medicare data in the USA. Furthermore I used a drug-disease open database to cluster the costs by disease. I identified the most expensive diseases (mostly chronic diseases such as Diabetes) and the most expensive medicines.

item.title: Visualizing parallel event series in Python
item.description: In this post, I will use Python to visualize two different series of events, plotting them on top of each other to gain insights from time series data.
